data.text:
Studio Twenty8 Guest House is a Guest house establishment located in Burgersdorp, Eastern Cape, South Africa.

Check-in time: 2:00 PM

Check-in time: 2:00 PM

285M+3F Burgersdorp, South Africa

Welcome to Studio Twenty8 Guest House!

Located in the charming town of Burgersdorp in the Eastern Cape, South Africa, Studio Twenty8 Guest House offers a welcoming and comfortable accommodation option for business travelers and tourists alike.

Conveniently situated at 28 Murray St, in the heart of Burgersdorp, our guest house provides easy access to local attractions and amenities while offering a peaceful retreat.

Upon arrival, you will be greeted by our friendly and attentive staff who are dedicated to ensuring your stay is enjoyable and stress-free. Our check-in time begins at 2:00 PM, allowing you to settle in at your own pace.

“Studio Twenty8 Guest House – Where convenience meets tranquility.”

The guest house features a range of well-appointed rooms designed to cater to your comfort and rest. Each room offers a tasteful blend of modern decor and home-like ambiance, providing a comfortable and relaxing space during your stay.

In addition to our cozy accommodations, Studio Twenty8 Guest House offers a range of amenities to enhance your experience. Take advantage of our complimentary Wi-Fi to stay connected, or unwind in our communal lounge area where you can socialize or catch up with work.

During your stay, explore the attractions of Burgersdorp and its surroundings. Immerse yourself in the rich history and heritage of the Eastern Cape, known for its cultural diversity and picturesque landscapes. Whether you’re interested in visiting historical landmarks, enjoying outdoor activities, or discovering the local cuisine, our attentive staff can provide recommendations and assist with planning your itinerary.

For those traveling on business, Studio Twenty8 Guest House offers a convenient location near local business hubs and amenities. After a productive day, you can relax in the comfort of your room or take a leisurely stroll through the town to experience its unique charm.
